description: A telegram bot a user can seek guidance from when playing the card game Sea Salt and Paper. It uses model context protocol (MCP) for a user to conveniently communicate on an existing chat app like Telegram.
title: Sea, Salt & Paper Game Master

description: This project acts as a visualizing tool for users to understand how the different data structures and algorithms work. I was able to grasp the foundations of React and how to apply the basic functionalities through the behavior of stacks, arrays queues, etc.
title: Algorithm Visualization

description: This project acts as a visualizing tool for users to understand the flood control scandal. This project is inspired from @wreckzonee from TikTok. It adds a feature where users can spend over a trillion pesos on both government projects and luxury items to see firsthand where their hard earned money goes to.
title: Flood Control

description: My first major coding project was building a maze game in Python during freshman year where the goal was to reach the exit by moving up, down, left, and right. At the time, I struggledâ€”I relied heavily on Stack Overflow, copy-pasted code, and ended up with 600+ lines I barely understood. Later, I revisited the project with a structured approach. I re-coded it in a single Jupyter notebook in just 128 lines, fully understanding the flow and being able to explain each component. To push myself further, I migrated it to JavaScript with a simple frontend so players could interact with the maze, adding more complexity but also proving to myself I could overcome the impostor syndrome I felt after college.
title: Maze 2.0

description: Learned how to draw elements using html and animate these using Tailwindcss.
title: Toggle Dark Mode

description: With the final season of The Summer I turned pretty coming to an end, I thought it would be fun to look at the overall series as a whole and how it impacted the fans of the series.
title: The Summer I Turned Pretty Dashboard

description: Learned how to use react hooks.
title: Steak Timer Dashboard
